# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Number
WS4578188387-Doc4580465935

## Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Contracting Entity Address
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
Canada

## End-User Entity
Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) / Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)

## Tender Details
- **Title (English/French)**: F6855-240071 CCGS Molly Kool Docking / F6855-240071 Mise en cale sèche du NGCC Molly Kool
- **Publication Date**: 14 May 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: 18 July 2024 at 14:00
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive-Open Bidding
- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Delivery**: Nova Scotia, Prince Edward Island, New Brunswick, Newfoundland and Labrador, Ontario (excluding National Capital Region), and Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)
- **Solicitation Type**: Request for Proposal

## Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG), is issuing this bid solicitation for the acquisition of ship repair work on the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Molly Kool. The work will be performed as detailed in Annex A attached to this solicitation.

## Contact Information

For any queries, please contact:
Jonathan Grant (SPAC/PSPC)
jonathan.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Additional Information

All tender documents can be accessed at <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19697886?extsite=MTk2OTc4ODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>. The tender is open for submission until the closing date specified above. Please ensure that your submission is made in accordance with the instructions provided in the tender package.
